00024 Clip::Clip (const std::vector<unsigned char> &image, const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned int &height, const unsigned int &width)
00025     : width_(width), height_(height)
00026 {
00027     // Compute the number of pixels within the clip
00028     nPixels_ = width_ * height_;
00029     
00030     // Allocate space for the clip
00031     pixels_.reserve(nPixels_);
00032     
00033     // Copy the contents of the frame within the source image to the clip
00034     unsigned int index = (x * width_) + y;
00035     std::vector<unsigned char>::const_iterator imageIterator = image.begin() + index;
00036     
00037     pixels_.assign (imageIterator, (imageIterator + nPixels_));
00038 };
00039 
00040 
00052 void Clip::setPixelGrayLevel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned char &grayLevel)
00053 {
00054     unsigned int index = (x * width_) + y;
00055     
00056     if ( index >= pixels_.size() )
00057         throw NessieException ("Clip::setPixelGrayLevel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned char &grayLevel) : The coordinates are outside the clip");
00058     
00059     pixels_[index] = grayLevel;
00060 };
00061 
00062 
00074 unsigned char Clip::getPixelGrayLevel (const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y) const
00075 {
00076     unsigned int index = (x * width_) + y;
00077     
00078     if ( index >= pixels_.size() )
00079         throw NessieException ("Clip::getPixelGrayLevel(const unsigned int &x, const unsigned int &y, const unsigned char &grayLevel) : The coordinates are outside the clip");
00080         
00081     return pixels_[index];
00082 };
